info.title: WebApplicationFirewallManagement
info.description: APIs to manage web application firewall rules.

get.description: Lists ExpressRoute gateways under a given subscription.
Lists all the P2SVpnGateways in a subscription.
Lists all the VirtualHubs in a subscription.
Lists all the VirtualWANs in a subscription.
Lists all the VpnGateways in a subscription.
Lists all the VpnServerConfigurations in a subscription.
Lists all the VpnSites in a subscription.
Lists ExpressRoute gateways in a given resource group.
Fetches the details of a ExpressRoute gateway in a resource group.

parameters.name: expressRouteGatewayName
parameters.description: The name of the ExpressRoute gateway.

put.description: Creates or updates a ExpressRoute gateway in a specified resource group.

parameters.description: The name of the ExpressRoute gateway.

parameters.name: putExpressRouteGatewayParameters
parameters.description: Parameters required in an ExpressRoute gateway PUT operation.

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

Retry-After.description: The Retry-After header can indicate how long the client should wait before polling the operation status.

delete.description: Deletes the specified ExpressRoute gateway in a resource group. An ExpressRoute gateway resource can only be deleted when there are no connection subresources.
